description: This file defines several data model classes used in the mobile app: Book, Category, OrderModel, and WishlistEntry. These models represent core entities for listing books, categorization, order summaries, and wishlist entries.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: A model representing a book with attributes such as ID, title, author, cover image URL, description, price in cents, optional old price, rating, and category slug.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: A model representing a book category identified by a slug and name.

classes.name: OrderModel
classes.description: A model representing a simple summary of a book order, including order ID, associated book, quantity, status, and order placement timestamp.

classes.name: WishlistEntry
classes.description: A model representing an entry in the wishlist, linking an ID to a Book object.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Book instance with optional overrides for each attribute.
